**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Storm-Struck Arboreal](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2351) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 447 **Perception** +28; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +26, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +30 **Str** +9 **Dex** +1 **Con** +6 **Int** +0 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +25 **Will** +30 **HP** 370 **Immunities** electricity **Resistances** bludgeoning 15, fire 15, piercing 15 **Weaknesses** axe vulnerability **Axe Vulnerability** A storm-struck arboreal takes 15 additional damage from axes.
**Electric Healing** Whenever the storm-struck arboreal would take electricity damage or is targeted with an electricity effect, it gains 15 temporary HP. --- **Speed** 40 feet **Melee** branch +33 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+15 bludgeoning **Melee** root +33 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 3d10+15 bludgeoning **Primal Innate Spells** DC 30 - **7th** [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (×3) - **8th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33) **Sunder Objects** When a storm-struck arboreal damages an item or structure it deals an additional 3d12 damage to that item or structure.
name: Storm-Struck Arboreal
